synopsis.text: A group of childhood friends find their bonds and past promises tested when reunited after many years apart. Itsuki, who went to America to pursue her dream of becoming a molding artist, returns to Japan hoping to reconnect with her childhood friends Ichitaka and Iori. However, the trio soon realize that time changes people - Iori is now an actress focused on her budding career, while Ichitaka struggles to decide who he truly cares for between the two girls. When the friends end up in a dangerous situation involving a mysterious sinking island, it becomes clear that the carefree days of their past are gone. Though their memories of shared times and promises linger, each of the friends must make choices about who they want to be and what they still mean to each other after so much time has passed. In the end, this story explores how the ghosts of our pasts can still impact our presents and futures, for better or worse.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
